# Low Cunning
## Overview
*Low Cunning (Ex):* You gain a bonus on initiative checks equal to half the bonus granted by your trap sense class feature. In addition, you may elect to use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Charisma modifier when making [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] skill checks. 

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 68
